title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid email, password, and confirm password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that registration completes successfully and user is redirected to login or home page.

title: User Registration Validation Errors
description: Verify that registration form shows errors for invalid inputs like duplicate email, weak password, and mismatched confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page.
Enter invalid email format.
Input weak password and mismatching confirm password.
Submit the form.
Verify validation error messages are displayed for email format, password strength, and password confirmation.
Use an already registered email and valid password.
Verify registration is rejected due to duplicate email.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that registered users can log in successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input registered email and valid password.
Click login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the home or profile page.

title: User Login Failure
description: Verify login fails with incorrect email or password, and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter unregistered email and any password.
Attempt to login.
Verify error message indicating invalid login credentials is shown.
Enter registered email with incorrect password.
Verify error message indicating invalid login credentials is shown.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that pages and API endpoints restrict access properly based on user roles: customer, moderator, admin.

steps.description: Log in as a customer.
Attempt to access admin panel pages.
Verify access is denied or redirected away.
Log in as a moderator.
Access moderator-allowed admin features.
Verify access is granted.
Log in as admin.
Access all admin panel features.
Verify full access is granted.
Attempt to call protected API endpoints without authentication.
Verify API responds with unauthorized status.

title: Product Catalog Filtering and Sorting
description: Verify product catalog filtering by category, brand, price range, and sorting by price or popularity works correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to products listing page.
Apply category filter.
Verify displayed products belong only to selected category.
Apply brand filter.
Verify displayed products are filtered by selected brand.
Apply price range filter with valid min and max values.
Verify products have prices within selected range.
Select sorting option by price ascending.
Verify products are ordered by price ascending.
Select sorting option by popularity.
Verify products are ordered by popularity descending.

title: Product Details Page Display
description: Verify product detail page displays correct information including images, description, price, stock status, and related products.

steps.description: Navigate to a product details page by clicking on a product from catalog.
Verify all product images load and image gallery navigates correctly.
Verify product name, description, price, and stock availability are displayed correctly.
Verify related products section displays relevant items.

title: Shopping Cart Operations
description: Verify adding items to cart, removing items, and updating quantity update the state and pricing correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a product details page.
Add product to cart with default quantity.
Verify cart displays newly added product with correct quantity and price.
Add another product to cart.
Verify both products appear in cart with correct individual and total price.
In the cart page, increase the quantity of a product.
Verify updated quantity and recalculated total price in the cart summary.
Remove a product from the cart.
Verify product is removed from the cart and total price is updated.

title: Checkout Flow Success
description: Verify the multi-step checkout flow completes successfully with valid shipping and payment details and creates an order.

steps.description: Log in as authenticated user with items in cart.
Go to checkout page.
Fill shipping form with valid address details.
Proceed to payment form.
Input valid payment card details using Stripe test tokens.
Submit payment.
Verify payment is processed successfully and order confirmation page is displayed.
Verify the new order appears in user order history and admin order management.

title: Checkout Flow Payment Failure Handling
description: Verify checkout flow handles Stripe payment failure or cancellation gracefully.

steps.description: Start checkout flow with valid cart.
Input valid shipping details and proceed.
Enter payment details with Stripe declined test card or simulate cancellation.
Submit payment.
Verify checkout shows payment failure or cancellation message.
Verify no order is created and user can retry payment or modify cart.

title: User Profile Management CRUD
description: Verify authenticated users can view and update personal info, manage addresses, favorite products, and account settings.

steps.description: Log in as an authenticated user.
Navigate to user profile page.
Verify personal information is displayed correctly.
Update personal info and save changes.
Verify changes persist after refresh.
Add a new address via address management page.
Verify new address appears in address list.
Edit and delete existing addresses.
Verify addresses update correctly after edits and removals.
Add and remove products from favorites.
Verify favorites list updates accordingly.

title: Admin Panel Product CRUD Operations
description: Verify admins can create, read, update, and delete products via the admin panel with proper validations.

steps.description: Log in as admin user.
Navigate to admin products management page.
Create a new product with all required fields and valid data.
Verify new product appears in the product list.
Edit the product details and save.
Verify updated product data is reflected in list and product pages.
Delete the product.
Verify product no longer appears in catalog or admin panel.

title: Admin Panel User Management and Role Assignments
description: Verify admins can manage users including creating, updating roles, and deleting accounts.

steps.description: Log in as admin.
Navigate to admin users management page.
Create a new user with customer role.
Verify new user appears in the users list.
Update existing user roles to moderator or admin.
Verify role changes are saved and applied correctly.
Delete a user account.
Verify user no longer exists and cannot log in.

title: API Endpoint Response and Error Handling
description: Verify all RESTful API endpoints respond correctly to valid requests and handle invalid or unauthorized requests gracefully.

steps.description: Send valid GET request to products endpoint.
Verify response contains products data with proper schema.
Send invalid request (e.g., malformed product ID) to product detail endpoint.
Verify response returns appropriate error status and message.
Send unauthorized request to protected admin API endpoints.
Verify response returns 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden status.

title: Responsive Design Verification
description: Verify the UI renders correctly and is usable across supported device sizes: mobile, tablet, desktop, and supports light/dark mode toggling.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browser.
Verify layout, navigation, and all UI elements display properly.
Resize browser or use emulator to simulate tablet screen.
Verify responsive layout adjusts correctly without content overlap or clipping.
Use mobile viewport emulator.
Verify mobile navigation and UI components render correctly and remain accessible.
Toggle between light and dark theme using theme switch.
Verify colors and UI elements adapt as expected without visual glitches.

title: Database Integrity and Relational Constraints
description: Verify that database schema enforces data integrity, relationships, and constraints as per application requirements.

steps.description: Insert product with valid foreign keys (category, brand) into database via API.
Verify insertion succeeds and relational links are correct.
Attempt to insert product with invalid or missing foreign keys.
Verify insertion fails with constraint violation errors.
Insert user with roles and related addresses and orders.
Verify data integrity across user, address, and order tables.
Delete parent record and verify cascading rules or restrictions.
Verify database responds according to defined foreign key policies.

title: Performance and SEO Checks
description: Verify pages load quickly with initial server-side rendering and skeleton loading states are shown during data fetches.

steps.description: Load homepage and product catalog pages with network throttling simulated.
Verify loading skeleton components display until data is fetched.
Verify page content is server-side rendered for SEO by checking source HTML.
Measure page load time under normal network conditions.
Verify load times meet performance requirements.
